President-elect Biden Calls on President.description: In a statement in Wilmington, Delaware, President-elect Biden calls on President Trump to go on television immediately  and demand that the protesters at the Capitol "end this siege." The president elect says today's events border on "sedition" and "insurrection" as he warns that the "democracy is under unprecedented assault." close

Army Secretary Announces New Security Me.title: Army Secretary Announces New Security Measures Around the Capitol
Army Secretary Announces New Security Me.summary: January 7, 2021~~~Army Secretary Announces New Security Measures Around the Capitol~~~At a briefing with D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) and other city officials, Army Secretary Ryan McCarthy addresses the security breach at the U.S. Capitol saying, "Yesterday was a horrible…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~2 minutes~~~1,112 views
Army Secretary Announces New Security Me.description: At a briefing with D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser (D) and other city officials, Army Secretary Ryan McCarthy addresses the security breach at the U.S. Capitol saying,  "Yesterday was a horrible and shameful day in our history." He goes on to provide an update on the Pentagon's response, saying the entire D.C. National Guard has been mobilized and that 6,200 guardsmen will be present in D.C. by the weekend, with reinforcements coming from neighboring states and beyond. He also says they are currently erecting a seven foot non-scalable fence around the Capitol building and that 800 guardsmen will be put in place this afternoon and will remain in the area for the next 30 days

Georgia Election Official Says President.title: Georgia Election Official Says President's Call with Secretary of State Wasn't "Normal"
Georgia Election Official Says President.summary: January 4, 2021~~~Georgia Election Official Says President's Call with Secretary of State Wasn't "Normal"~~~During a news conference in Atlanta, Georgia election official Gabriel Sterling (R) addresses the leaked phone call between President Trump and Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~29 seconds~~~1,010 views
Georgia Election Official Says President.description: During a news conference in Atlanta, Georgia election official Gabriel Sterling (R) addresses the leaked phone call  between President Trump and Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger (R), in which the president pressured the secretary to "find" votes to flip the state in his favor. "I personally found it to be something that was not normal, out of place and … nobody I know who would be president would do something like that to a secretary of State," Sterling says

President Trump Says He Hopes Vice Presi.title: President Trump Says He Hopes Vice President Pence "Comes Through" for Him at Electoral College Certification
President Trump Says He Hopes Vice Presi.summary: January 4, 2021~~~President Trump Says He Hopes Vice President Pence "Comes Through" for Him at Electoral College Certification~~~During a campaign rally for Republicans David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler ahead of their runoff elections in Georgia’s 2020 U.S. Senate races, President Trump accuses Democrats of stealing…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~56 seconds~~~965 views
President Trump Says He Hopes Vice Presi.description: During a campaign rally for Republicans David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler ahead of their runoff elections in Georgia’s 2020 U.S. Senate races, President Trump accuses Democrats of stealing the election and says he hopes Vice President Pence “comes through” for him when Congress meets in a Joint Session to count the Electoral College votes. "I hope Mike Pence comes through for us, I have to tell you. I hope that our great vice president comes through for us.... Of course, if he doesn’t come through, I won’t like him quite as much," the president tells the crowd

Speaker Pelosi Calls for Invoking of 25t.title: Speaker Pelosi Calls for Invoking of 25th Amendment to Remove President Trump From Office
Speaker Pelosi Calls for Invoking of 25t.summary: January 7, 2021~~~Speaker Pelosi Calls for Invoking of 25th Amendment to Remove President Trump From Office~~~House Speaker Nancy Pelosi calls on Vice President Pence and Cabinet officials to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove President Trump from office. She says if they fail to do so, the House…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~3 minutes~~~964 views
Speaker Pelosi Calls for Invoking of 25t.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi calls on Vice President Pence and Cabinet officials to invoke the 25th Amendment to remove President Trump from office. She says if they fail to do so, the House may be prepared to move forward with articles of impeachment against the president. Speaker Pelosi says the President Trump "incited an insurrection against America." She also says that Republicans who have enabled the president and repeated his false claims about widespread voter fraud should also be held accountable and she condemns them for proceeding with their objections to certifying the electoral votes even after the day's events

The Process for Counting Electoral Votes.description: Edward Foley, director of the election law program at the Ohio State University, explained the process that will take place on January 6, 2021 when Congress meets in a joint session to count the electoral votes for president. He discussed the Hayes-Tilden election of 1876, Electoral Count Act and the role of the vice president in this process. He also spoke about what to expect during the joint session

President-elect Biden Criticizes Trump A.title: President-elect Biden Criticizes Trump Administration's Vaccine Distribution Effort
President-elect Biden Criticizes Trump A.summary: January 4, 2021~~~President-elect Biden Criticizes Trump Administration's Vaccine Distribution Effort~~~During a campaign rally in Georgia, on the eve of the two Senate runoff elections, President-elect Biden urges supporters to vote for Jon Ossoff and Reverend Raphael Warnock to help get…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~50 seconds~~~729 views
President-elect Biden Criticizes Trump A.description: During a campaign rally in Georgia, on the eve of the two Senate runoff elections, President-elect Biden urges supporters to vote for Jon Ossoff and Reverend Raphael Warnock to help get help to the states to battle the COVID-19 pandemic. He also criticizes the Trump administration's effort to distribute the vaccine, saying it "has gotten off to a god-awful start." And he accuses the president of "whining and complaining instead of doing something about the problem," before adding, "I don't know why he still wants the job. He doesn't want to do the work." close

Senator Graham Says He Doesn't Support I.title: Senator Graham Says He Doesn't Support Invoking 25th Amendment "At This Time"
Senator Graham Says He Doesn't Support I.summary: January 7, 2021~~~Senator Graham Says He Doesn't Support Invoking 25th Amendment "At This Time"~~~Senate Judiciary Committee Chair Senator Lindsey Graham (R-SC) says the president's remarks at a rally near the White House and the subsequent breach of the Capitol by his supporters have…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~2 minutes~~~603 views
Senator Graham Says He Doesn't Support I.description: Senate Judiciary Committee Chair Senator Lindsey Graham (R-SC) says the president's remarks at a rally near the White House and the subsequent breach of the Capitol by his supporters have "tarnished" his record of accomplishments.  He also says that he doesn't think invoking the 25th Amendment would be appropriate "at this time." He calls for a reset and says that he is focused on an orderly transfer of power to a Biden-Harris administration and has received an update from White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows and General Counsel Pat Cipollone

Merrick Garland Remarks on Selection as.description: Judge Merrick Garland delivers remarks in Wilmington, Delaware, after President-elect Biden selected him to be the next attorney general of the United States. He also speaks about the breaching of the U.S. Capitol by supporters of President Trump during the Electoral College vote certification. "As everyone who watched yesterday's events in Washington now understands — if they did not understand before — the rule of law is not just a turn of phrase. It is the very foundation of our democracy," he says

Senator Schumer Calls for Impeachment of.title: Senator Schumer Calls for Impeachment of President Trump If 25th Amendment Isn't Invoked
Senator Schumer Calls for Impeachment of.summary: January 7, 2021~~~Senator Schumer Calls for Impeachment of President Trump If 25th Amendment Isn't Invoked~~~Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer says the House should proceed with articles of impeachment of President Trump if Vice President Pence and the Cabinet fail to invoke the 25th…~~~C-SPAN clip by etouhey~~~3 minutes~~~381 views
Senator Schumer Calls for Impeachment of.description: Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer says the House should proceed with articles of impeachment of President Trump if Vice President Pence and the Cabinet fail to invoke the 25th Amendment and remove him form office. His call comes a day after supporters of the president stormed the Capitol as a Joint Session of Congress met to certify the Electoral College vote. Senator Schumer also says that those responsible should be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. "No leniency," he says

New York City Mayor de Blasio Responds t.description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio responds to a question about the slow pace of COVID-19 vaccinations in the city, saying he and the officials in charge need to "do better." He says there were several challenges to deal with including logistics and ensuring that the vaccine was safe. He also says that the city must now ramp up its vaccination effort but warns that there are some people, including some on the front lines who do not want to take the vaccine and that that presents its own challenges
